title: Sponsored: Coming Soon: Season 3 of The Relentless
description:
Get ready for another season of The Relentless: a podcast that rethinks business and redefines success. In Season 3, we’re looking at how entrepreneurs can overcome assumptions and move fearlessly in real estate, business, and beyond. Host Kristen Meinzer is back for more conversations with guests who succeed by finding motivation and creativity in the face of obstacles. From athletes who break boundaries to entrepreneurs who are reshaping industries, we’ll hear diverse guests share how they transform their fears into inspiration.


This paid podcast is produced by Slate Studios and CENTURY 21 Real Estate. 
© 2022 CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC. All rights reserved. CENTURY 21®, the CENTURY 21 Logo and C21® are registered marks owned by CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC. CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act. Each office is independently owned and operated. This material may contain suggestions and best practices that you may use at your discretion. The opinions expressed in this podcast are those of the individuals featured and not necessarily of CENTURY 21 Real Estate.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
